title: List of all Android bottom navigation bar  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android bottom navigation bar  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: BottomBar
repoList.description: (Deprecated) A custom view component that mimics the new Material Design Bottom Navigation pattern.

repoList.name: BottomNavigation
repoList.description: This Library helps users to use Bottom Navigation Bar (A new pattern from google) with ease and allows ton of customizations

repoList.name: SmoothBottomBar
repoList.description: A lightweight Android material bottom navigation bar library

repoList.name: NiceBottomBar
repoList.description: A lightweight Android material bottom navigation bar library

repoList.name: CurveBottomBar
repoList.description: Create curve bottom navigation using this library

repoList.name: AnimatedBottomBar
repoList.description: This library allows you to show bottom navigation quickly, simply and animated.

repoList.name: NavigationBottomBar
repoList.description: How modify the Android Design Support Library: Bottom Navigation View

repoList.name: BottomBarNavigation
repoList.description: Android material design specific Bottom Navigation Bar library

repoList.name: AnimatedBottomBar
